services.name: Wellness & Prevention
services.description: Comprehensive annual check-ups to keep your pet healthy, including physical exams, parasite screening, and nutritional counseling.

services.name: Vaccinations
services.description: Customized vaccination plans to protect your pet from common and serious infectious diseases based on their lifestyle and risk factors.

services.name: Dental Care
services.description: From routine cleanings to advanced oral surgery, we help maintain your pet's dental hygiene, which is crucial for their overall health.

services.name: Surgery
services.description: Our state-of-the-art surgical suite is equipped for a wide range of procedures, from spaying and neutering to more complex operations.

services.name: Diagnostics
services.description: We use advanced in-house diagnostic tools, including digital X-rays and laboratory services, for fast and accurate results.

services.name: Emergency Care
services.description: We are equipped to handle urgent care situations during our business hours. Please call ahead to let us know you're on your way.

team.name: Dr. Emily Carter
team.title: Lead Veterinarian, DVM
team.bio: Dr. Carter founded The Caring Paw with the vision of providing compassionate, high-quality care. She has a special interest in internal medicine and animal behavior.

team.name: Dr. Ben Adams
team.title: Veterinarian, DVM
team.bio: Dr. Adams is a skilled surgeon with a passion for orthopedics and emergency medicine. He loves finding solutions for complex cases and seeing his patients recover.

team.name: Maria Rodriguez
team.title: Lead Veterinary Technician
team.bio: Maria has been a certified veterinary technician for over 10 years. She ensures the clinic runs smoothly and provides loving care to every animal that comes through our doors.
